column5: If anyone has a boat and needs someone to split costs on Saturdays I would be interested.
Hey John i have a boat usually head out ever second sat or sunday where u interested in going mabey we can get together some time.
Should have kept the Alumacraft.lol. Sean's been out almost every day the last week. He's got a nice 6hp merc 4stroke for a kicker too now. I must say. Nice boat.
On a more serious note. I'll probably need some company over the summer. I'll keep you in mind.
Thanks for the offer.I'm up for anything anywhere.  Where and what did you have in mind?
Thanks.Ya I know, but I had to get rid of it. I cried when I sold it!  He got a deal and a half on that boat and it will give him years of fun. If he wants to sell it I will gladly re buy it off him.
Thanks. Look forward to meeting new people and sharing techniques.
Your always welcome. Looking forward to having you out.
